name: Mitchell Phillips - Port Lytton
description:
A large storm hit the small port town Lytton and you have been stuck inside your lighthouse keeping the flame lit... A few days pass and you leave to go pick up supplies in the greater part of the town and find nary a soul anywhere...

Explore and find out what happened to the people of Port Lytton!

~~~~

Historical military site Fort Lytton reconstructed as a Medieval Port Town in the middle of the ocean.

~~~~

VR Interactions:

  • Bottles
  • Rocks
  • Small Crates/Boxes

PROTOTYPE STILL IN PROCESS

~~~~
